name: Turquoise's Reverie
introduction:
◆ Event Rules ◆
Clear specific stages to obtain event rewards.

◆ Event Requirement ◆
Unlocked after reaching Trailblaze Level <unbreak>21</unbreak> and completing the mission "Fleeting Lights."

◆ Event Rewards ◆
Clear the Forgotten Hall Memory Stage 3 to obtain the 4-star character Qingque (Erudition: Quantum).
